biography.bio: Tall, muscular and exotic, Marco Banderas is another one of the veterans in the adult industry, today. Debuting in 2003, at age 36, Marco wasted no time in showing how well he can perform on camera and how dedicated he is to the business he loves so much. In addition to his on-screen appearances, Marco Banderas also lent his hand in the directorial capacity of the porn world. His credits as a performer top well over 1,000 since his starting year and they continue to grow as time marches on. The product of Uruguay, gave to the porn industry a versatile performer, director and singer who obviously has longevity in whatever business he chooses to be apart of.
biography.name: Marco Banderas

biography.bio: Manuel Ferrara was born on November 1, 1975 in Gagny, Seine-Saint-Denis, France as Manuel Jeannin. He is an actor and director. He is married to Kayden Kross. They have one child. He was previously married to Dana Vespoli.

biography.bio: Veteran porn actor Tommy Gunn was born Thomas Joseph Strada in Cherry Hill, New Jersey. A self-described "hyper kid" who needed a great deal of attention due to his small stature, he often asked his mother, "When will I grow up?" During his early years Tommy grew interested in sports, BMX bicycles and motorcycles, in addition to soccer. He was shy around girls for quite some time until he noticed how girls were interested in bigger and "buffer" guys, so he took up bodybuilding. He entered a "hot body" contest in a local bar, and although he lost the contest, he met a man who offered him work as a stripper. For ten years Tommy worked as a male stripper, traveling all over the country and the world. One of his girlfriends, who was also a stripper, asked him to join her on a trip to Los Angeles to become a porn star. While out there he met Brad Armstrong, another porn actor, who took Tommy under his wing and helped him establish what turned into a thriving career. For his work Tommy has won the AVN Best Supporting Actor (2006) and in 2007 won the AVN Male Performer of the Year.
biography.name: Tommy Gunn

biography.bio: Porn star Jenna Haze was born and raised in conservative Orange County, California. Her parents divorced when she was young. At 15 she had to drop out of high school to help support the family, and worked at a succession of low-paying jobs. When she turned 18 she tried stripping for a living, but didn't like it and quit after only one day. A year later she met someone at a club who had connections to the adult-film industry and told her she would be perfect for that business. Intrigued, she decided to try it, and two days later was shooting her first porn scene at a studio in the San Fernando Valley. At first she used an agent to secure work, but soon realized that she could do better on her own and dropped him. She worked almost nonstop until she took a "breather" during the Christmas season of 2001 and didn't make any films for several months. When she came back in early 2002 she was hired by Jill Kelly Productions for one film, and they were so impressed with her that they offered her a contract, which she eventually accepted.
biography.name: Jenna Haze

biography.bio: Tall (5'8"), buxom, and shapely brunette knockout Jayden Jaymes was born Michele Mayo on February 13, 1986 in Upland, California. Jayden has a younger sister and a brother. Jaymes did tap and ballet for eight years while growing up. Jayden started out in the adult entertainment industry as an exotic dancer while attending college full time (she studied accounting and business). The blue-eyed stunner began performing in explicit hardcore movies at age 20 in November, 2006. She was nominated for an AVN Award for Best New Starlet in 2009 and won an AVN Award for Best Group Sex Scene in 2010. Moreover, Jaymes has appeared in a few mainstream pictures in small roles. Jayden runs her own official website and operates her own fiercely opinionated and controversial blog in which she candidly addresses the ups and downs of the adult business. She resides in New York City.
biography.name: Jayden Jaymes

biography.bio: Buxom and shapely 5'4" brunette knockout Kianna Dior was born on November 17, 1969 in Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada. Of mixed Chinese and Scottish descent, Dior began her career in the adult entertainment industry as a stripper in Vancouver. After dancing at local clubs in between Vancouver and Alberta for about four years, Kianna decided in 1999 to take a crack at performing in explicit hardcore movies after established porn starlet and fellow exotic dancer Shay Sights advised her to do so. biography.bio: Buxom and shapely 5'3" brunette knockout RayVeness was born Karen M. Swaim on June 19, 1972 in Jamestown, North Carolina. Of German and Irish descent, and raised in the Quaker faith, she got married to her first husband a year prior to leaving high school. RayVeness worked at various fast food restaurants as well as a babysitter and an Avon saleswoman prior to starting out in the adult film industry at age 18 in 1990 (in fact, she did her first sex scene on her 18th birthday for the company Homegrown Video). Her porn pseudonym is of Indian origin and means "of the spirit". In 2000 RayVeness took a hiatus from hardcore movies and attempted a more mainstream career with only moderate success. She was nominated for a XRCO Award for MILF of the Year in 2006. Moreover, she took a second hiatus from June, 2006 to August, 2007 to have a child via in vitro fertilization. In July, 2009 RayVeness became the first contract star for the all-girl company Girlfriends Films and, later, announced her retirement from the adult film industry on her Twitter account in February, 2011. She was inducted into the XRCO Hall of Fame that same year. RayVeness came out of retirement again in July, 2012. The mother of a son, she sings and writes music in her spare time.
biography.name: RayVeness

biography.bio: Tanya Pankov is a Canadian actress known for her leading role as "Eve" in the feature film After Eden (2015) which premiered in the New Directors competition at the SSIFF. Better known under her pseudonym "Alyssa Reece," she has worked in the adult film industry with major studios, including Penthouse, Hustler and Vivid Entertainment.

biography.bio: The consistently entertaining Anthony Rosano has made an indelible impression in the world of adult filming. Anthony, whose alternate names include Mike McKay, Doughy Gecko and Anthony Russo, was born on January 31, 1977. A native of Hialeah, Florida, he first set foot upon the erotic entertainment scene in 2003 at 26 years old. Since then he has worked for numerous companies, most notably Elegant Angel, New Sensations and Digital Sin. He virtually transmutes between being a toned hunk on camera to being an FBI agent in the porn-styled parodies The Sex Files: A Dark XXX Parody (2009)_ and the prompt follow-up sequel The Sex Files 2: A Dark XXX Parody (2010), both films produced by Digital, in which he played the role parodying Agent Mulder and co-star Kimberly Kane, likewise parodying the role of Agent Scully.
biography.name: Anthony Rosano
